record.name: Change Personal Information
record.description: Update personal information such as address, phone numbers, and emergency contacts.
record.detailedDescription: Update personal information such as address, phone numbers, and emergency contacts.
record.options: <form><text id="address" label="Address" multiline="true"/><text id="phone" label="Phone"/><text id="contacts" label="Emergency Contacts" multiline="true"/></form>
